events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it does not fit me well.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to mention of return and refund.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative Jane Smith for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund accordingly?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is just too small, and I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. You may return the jacket within 30 days using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and we will refund the full purchase price once we receive the item.
That sounds great, thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label for the return.
We have sent you the prepaid shipping label via email. Please use it to return the jacket, and your refund will be processed within 5 business days after receipt.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Thanks again for your support!
Your refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us and we hope to serve you again soon.
We have sent a short survey to your email to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
